page.title: 17HOMELIFE
page.content: HOMELIFE TANG HALL AREA Mum spends her day at home cleaning, washing and shopping. Five nights a week she works as a cleaner in an office in town. Dad is a welder but he hasn't a job at the moment. My mum says he gets in her way during the day. After school I go and play on my B.M.X. bike at the tip, or football on the school field. Sometimes I watch T.V. My favourite programme is the A-team. My sister doesn't go out much. Mum says she needs a hobby. My brother is always fishing in the River Ouse. Dad goes to the pub sometims to play darts. Mum doesn't go out much. She always says she has no money. Tang Hall is not bad sometimes but I wish we had a sports centre with a swimming pool near our house.
